name: Whistle While You Brew 2
description:
Spring Capstone 2022, a demo build.

Whistle While You Brew 2 is a magical coffee shop sim that has you meeting the endless bustle to satisfy your customers’ needs!

A PC adaptation of the original Virtual Reality version, WWYB 2 has been updated with new 3D graphics and sound—now meant to be playable on your computer! Use only your mouse to play and get that cash!

Current bugs (04/2022):

  • Some customer models overlap with their order, making it unreadable.
  • Coffee machine cube doesn’t fill the cup when clicked
  • Mouse controls do not match up with actual mouse motion

Credits:

  • Ariel Sturgis - 3D character models/textures and food props/textures 
  • Travis Faas - Programming, UI, environment art
  • Yecat's Alchemy Starter Pack for the magical props around the coffee shop!
  • Yana Melnyk's House Plant prop set!
  • "Ultralounge" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
